column2: Therefore  in  the  context  of procedural  fairness,  I find  that  the  Council  has
to  afford  the  Respondent  a  "fair  inquiry"  prior  to  the  decision
reflected  in  the  impugned  decisions  marked  "P9" and  "PIO",  to  proceed with  the
construction  according  to  the  approval  granted  by  the  Council.  As  such  the  order

column1: given by  the learned High Court Judge is affirmed.
